cont.entity_a: Purchased for $450. Not worth $2000, but reasonable for $450.
cont.entity_b: Used model purchased for $300, suitable for beginners or full-frame enthusiasts.

cont.entity_a: Superior to Canon Rebel series. Professional body with weather sealing.
cont.entity_b: Top-notch with solid feel and well-laid-out controls.

cont.entity_a: 4.2MP resolution is low but can be managed with interpolation.

Features.comm: Older model but still offers pro features.

cont.entity_b: Delivers excellent pictures. Full-frame camera offers effective wide-angle lens performance.

cont.entity_a: Usable photos at 1600 ISO despite older technology.
cont.entity_b: Image quality, dynamic range, and color are superior. Great image quality and consistent output. Noticeable sharpness difference compared to crop sensors.
Original 5D has personality in presentation, unlike newer 5D models focused on sharpness.
Sensor required cleaning and battery had short life, but seller provided replacement.
Missing strap in the bundle and initial issues with charger and mirror.
